name: intelligent-driver-forwarder
description: Automated system for monitoring trucking industry news and posting to Facebook

scripts.job: node -e "const CronJobs = require('./src/scheduler/cronJobs'); const jobs = new CronJobs(); jobs.init().then(() => jobs.runJobManually(process.argv[2])).then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(e => { console.error(e); process.exit(1); })"
scripts.test-facebook: node -e "const PostManager = require('./src/facebook/postManager'); const pm = new PostManager(); pm.testConnection().then(r => console.log(JSON.stringify(r, null, 2))).catch(e => console.error(e.message));"
